patthana4.5:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:4.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.5:6.1_0: Kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo kusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.5:9.1_0: Kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo kusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
